text: 18.105 Play and recreation spaces and facilities should serve all members of the Tower Hamlets community and should be genuinely inclusive. 18.106 To achieve this, development proposals are encouraged to engage in co-design with local residents, with a particular emphasis on engaging children and young people in the design process. This should occur as early in the design process as possible to ensure that the codesign is meaningful and can influence the layout of other elements of the development proposal (see part 2(a)). 18.107 Part 2(b) provides key design criteria for play and informal recreation facilities.
